dcterms:description: Box-World is a perceptually simple but combinatorially complex environment that requires abstract relational reasoning and planning. It consists of a 12 × 12 pixel room with keys and boxes randomly scattered, where an agent must collect a gem by unlocking boxes using keys.
dcterms:title: Box-World

Julian Schrittwieser
dcterms:description: The StarCraft II Learning Environment (SC2LE) provides a suite of mini-games designed to test reinforcement learning agents in a simplified setup with a well-defined reward structure, representing the mechanics of the full StarCraft II game.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II Learning Environment (SC2LE)
